channel.title: Mini Tanks By Solemn Wishes -Another scar mini-game -
channel.description:
Hi guys,
i started making this yesterday night and i thought i migth aswell show you it now before my head explodes, its pretty simple but still needs a bit of work done.
controls -
mouse to fire left and right arrow keys to move
objective -
destroy as many tanks as you can without dying, defend your base.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/3044/imagetesthi1.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/6109/test2mr8.jpg[/img][/URL]
enjoy :)
download direct here - http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/scripts/Tanks.rar
*bug* the second time the tanks respawn the scar background thingy dont seem to work, doesnt affect the game though....tyring to fix that :)

item.title: Mini Tanks By Solemn Wishes -Another scar mini-game -
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:13, topic:11009”][quote author=Janilabo link=topic=16239.msg187750#msg187750 date=1156662169]
I think once solemn said that, he got inspired by that Bejeweled game, which is made by Kaitnieks. If I remember right, hehe.

I am sure you also got inspired by it, yakman.
[/quote]

ye, i was inspired by his game but his fastdraw test was a goodmore basic example.

yes i did, but i also learnt fastdrawing by reading kaitnieks fastdraw test ;D (also a default scar script)[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: August 28, 2006, 03:54:31 PM[/size][hr]Ok sorry this took a while lol i got rid of the thign that makes the tanks go red around it…

Read full topic

item.source: Mini Tanks By Solemn Wishes -Another scar mini-game -

item.title: Mini Tanks By Solemn Wishes -Another scar mini-game -
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

very nice, sort of like space invaders or something

you say you started this last night? :eek: how did you make it so quick?

i dont know if your planning to continue working on it, but if you are, good luck with ironing out the bugs

as for the SCAR game craze, no idea why thats happened, but we’re not the first people to make such a thing.

look in this place
c:\program files\scar2.03\scripts\bejewlded.scar

its basicly a SCAR game written by kaitneiks, its about some jewels that you move around
a strange thing is that it uses forms instead of fastdrawing

the SCAR games will die down when people realise that SCAR is generaly designed for “simulating human interaction on online games” not making little games

Read full topic

marauder1:

i actually use flash mx2k4, i think its better. but i think its just for fun, like esoteric programming languages

I guess. lol flash mx2k4? You mean Flash MX 2004? It is pretty nice. I can’t animate for shit though lol, I can just make a few games. That is true, it is for fun for me too, but ideal to make games.
